A cow named after a Spice Girl has sold for a world record price.
Wilodge Poshspice was sold for £262,000 ($469,000) at an auction in Carlisle, England, doubling the previous record of £131,250 that… [+557 chars]

articles.title: Greenland review – comet disaster movie with a surprisingly deep impact - The Guardian
articles.description: Gerard Butler does more than just punch his way out of imminent apocalypse in Ric Roman Waugh’s sharp action film
